name: CHAPTER 11 孩子们喜欢的基本游戏
CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候

contents.en: Mommy, play with me.
Ok! Let's see what we can do.
contents.ch: 好啊，我们来看看可以玩什么。

contents.en: Mommy, I'm bored.
It's play time!
Mom, can you play with me?
I wonder what's fun to play.
contents.ch: 我想知道有什么好玩的。

contents.en: Do you have anything fun?
I‗ll stop reading now.
I don't want to watch TV anymore.
I hate to play alone.
I need friends to play together with.
Want to have some fun?
Are you ready to have fun?
contents.ch: 你准备好要玩有趣的吗？

contents.en: Let's find something fun.
Yay! Sounds great!
Okay. My baby must have been bored.
contents.ch: 好，我的宝贝一定很无聊吧。

contents.en: Sure. What do you want to do with me,  Sweetheart?
contents.ch: 当然，你想跟我玩什么呢，甜心？

contents.en: What should we play?
Do whatever you want to do.
Let's do anything.
Mom, let's solve a puzzle.
Mommy's feeling good today. I can play with you all day long.
contents.ch: 妈妈今天的状况很好，可以陪你玩一整天。

contents.en: Playing with my baby is the most fun.
contents.ch: 跟我的宝贝玩是最有趣的。

contents.en: I love it when Mommy plays games with me.
contents.ch: 我最喜欢妈妈跟我玩游戏了。

contents.en: Let's play next time.
Can't you see Mommy's very busy?
contents.ch: 你没有看到妈妈在忙吗？

contents.en: Sorry. Mommy's too busy.
I'll play with you after I do the dishes.
I'm working, sou I'll play with you later.
contents.ch: 我在工作，晚一点再跟你玩。

contents.en: I can play with you in a minute after work.
contents.ch: 再一会工作结束后，就能跟你玩。

contents.en: Can you wait? Thanks.
Wait! Let's play a little later.
contents.ch: 等一下！等一下再一起玩。

contents.en: Wait for five minutes.
Can you play with me in 5 minutes?
contents.ch: 五分钟后，你能跟我玩吗？

contents.en: I want to play right now.
Play with me right away.
Not now.
There's no time today./ I have no time today.
It's too late. Let's play a lot tomorrow.
contents.ch: 太晚了，明天我们再大玩特玩。

contents.en: There's too much to do right now.
contents.ch: 现在有太多事要去做了。

contents.en: Mommy also wants to play with you, but I can't  right now.
contents.ch: 妈妈也想跟你玩，但是现在不行。

contents.en: Ask Daddy to play with you.
Daddy always says he's busy.
If I wait, you have to play with me some more.
contents.ch: 如果我等你的话，你一定要跟我多玩一

contents.en: Then when can you find time?/ When are you  free then?
contents.ch: 会。那么，你什么时候有时间呢？

contents.en: You can do it later after playing with me.
contents.ch: 你可以跟我玩之后再去做吧。

contents.en: How long should we play?
Let's set up a time to play.
I'll set the timer for 30 minutes.
When the timer goes off, we'll stop.
contents.ch: 定时器一响，我们就停止。

contents.en: Let's play with blocks for 40 minutes starting now.
contents.ch: 现在开始，我们玩积木40分钟。

contents.en: Let's play at the playground for an hour.
contents.ch: 我们在游乐场玩一个小时吧。

contents.en: I want to play for 2 hours.
2 hours is too long. Let's play for only 1 hour.
contents.ch: 两个小时太长，我们就玩一个小时。

contents.en: Let's promise to play for 20 minutes.
20 minutes is too short.
I need more time to play.
Just one more round, please.
Only for 5 more minutes.
Next time, you should keep your word.
contents.ch: 下次，你要遵守你说的话。

contents.en: Let's finish after 3 more rounds.
contents.ch: 再玩三次后，我们就结束吧。

contents.en: We only have 5 minutes left.
Time's up! Done!
The alarm went off!
I want to play more.
When I play, an hour feels like a second.
contents.ch: 我玩的时候，一个小时感觉就像一秒钟

contents.en: You promised to play for an hour, right?
You should tell playtime from work time.
contents.ch: 你应该分清楚玩的时间和学习的时间。

contents.en: As a kid, all I do is play.
contents.ch: 我是个小孩，我所要做的就是玩。

contents.en: Mom, I'll play on the playground till 6:00.
contents.ch: 妈，我会再游乐场玩到6点。

contents.en: I'll clean up after I finish this game.
contents.ch: 等这个游戏结束后，我会整理。

contents.en: Peek- a- boo!
Honey, where's Mommy?
There you are, Mommy!
I got you, Mommy!
You can't see me, can you?
Where's my little baby?
I can hear you.
I can't see my baby.
Where did he/ she go?
Should I open the door?
Hide under the covers.
Huh? Who's talking?
There you are!
Ta- Da! * Your were here. Were you surprised?
contents.ch: 两手张开秀出东西的效果声。 哒哒！看到你了！你在这里耶。有吓到吗？

contents.en: Isn't peek- a- boo fun?
Want to do it again?
That was fun. Can you do it again?
contents.ch: 好好玩喔。你能再来一次吗？

contents.en: Let's play rock, paper, scissors.
contents.ch: 我们来玩剪刀石头布吧。

contents.en: Rock, paper, scissors, go!
I'll tell you the rules, go!
You make a fist for rock like this.
contents.ch: 石头只要这样握住拳头就可以。

contents.en: Doesn't rock actually look like a stone?
contents.ch: 石头看起来真的很像石头吧？

contents.en: You put two fingers out, and that's scissors.
contents.ch: 伸出两根手指就是剪刀了。

contents.en: It really looks like a pair of scissors cutting paper,  right?
contents.ch: 看来跟剪纸张的剪刀真的很像，对吧？

contents.en: Paper is stretching out your hand.
Paper looks like a piece of paper, doesn't it?
contents.ch: 布看起来很像一块布，对吧？

contents.en: Rock beats scissors.
Scissors beats paper.
Paper beats rock.
Rock can smash scissors.
Scissors can cut paper.
Paper can wrap rock.
If you both make the same thing, it's a draw.
contents.ch: 如果双方都出一样的话，就是平手。

contents.en: We both had the same thing. Let's try again.
contents.ch: 我们都出一样的了。再来一次。

contents.en: You have to make it at the same time.
If you change after throwing one, that's cheating.
contents.ch: 如果出了之后，又换的话，就是犯规。

contents.en: It's cheating if you make it late.
The winner goes first.
I always win at rock, paper, scissors.
contents.ch: 玩剪刀石头布，我总是赢。

contents.en: He lost but keeps saying he won.
contents.ch: 他输了，可是硬说他赢了。

contents.en: You made it late.
Follow the rules.
I won! I'll go first.
You lost.
Let's play hide and seek.
Want to play hide and seek? Come here!
contents.ch: 要玩捉迷藏吗？到这里来!

contents.en: I'll be"it", so you hide.
Hide yourself safely.
Okay. I'll count to ten.
Come to ten slowly.
Count to ten and look for the hidden people.
contents.ch: 数到十之后，去找出藏起来的人。

contents.en: You shouldn't peek. / No peeking.
Mom's "it". Let's hide quickly.
contents.ch: 妈是鬼，我们快点藏起来。

contents.en: Where should we hide?
Don't hide in a dangerous place.
contents.ch: 不可以躲在危险的地方。

contents.en: Whew, I can't find you.
Ready or not, here I come!
I can see your shirt.
I can see where you hid.
Did you hide behind the chair?
You're not here! Where are you, Sweetie?
contents.ch: 没有在这里！甜心，你在哪里？

contents.en: I'll find you. Just wait!
I heard a sound over there.
I know you're hiding under the covers.
contents.ch: 我知道你藏在被子里面。

contents.en: There you are! Come out.
Mommy is a hider now.
contents.ch: 现在轮到妈妈要藏起来。

contents.en: You find me too soon!
Daddy, you are the seeker, and we're the hiders.
contents.ch: 爸爸，你是鬼，我们是要藏起来的人。

contents.en: You'll be "it" this time.
Find a good hiding spot.
I'll go under the desk.
I'll be behind the curtain.
Don't move.
Duck your head. I can see you.
contents.ch: 弯下你的头，我能看到你。

contents.en: Hush. Be quiet! The seeker can hear you.
Let's hide here together.
You're a great hide- and- seek player.
contents.ch: 你真的是玩捉迷藏的高手。

contents.en: Ollie, Ollie oxen free!
Who wants to play tag?
Let's pick the tagger. / Let's pick "it".
Who wants to be "it"?
Let's pick by playing rock, paper, scissors.
contents.ch: 用剪刀石头布来决定鬼吧。

contents.en: You're the tagger. / You're "it".
I don't want to be "it".
I'll be the tagger.
Come and catch me, Mom!
You're really fast. Mom can't catch you.
You're "it" this time.
I got him first.
Let me get you, please!
It's hard to breathe! / Phew, I'm out of breath. /  Eeee, I'm exhausted!
Stop there!
Mommy's coming. Run away.
No! Don't catch me!
I'm getting close. I'm almost there.
contents.ch: 我越来越近了。我快到了。

contents.en: Reach home first. Then, you will win against the  tagger.
contents.ch: 先到家，这样，你就会赢抓人的鬼。

contents.en: I want to play house.
Let's have a tea party.
I'll play the role of the baby. You be Dad.
I'll play Mom.
Let's use this for a table.
I'll make a salad for you, Mom I'll cut the tomato in half and cook it.
contents.ch: 妈妈，我来为你做沙拉。我来吧番茄切成两半后煮。

contents.en: I put the egg in the pan.
contents.ch: 我把鸡蛋放在平底锅上。

contents.en: Mom, I'm hungry.
Mommy will cook for you, my baby.
It's time for milk, Sweetie.
Emm... Mommy, it's yummy.
There's no milk. Let's go to the market. / We're  out of milk. Let's go to the grocery store.
contents.ch: 没有牛奶了。我们去市场/杂货店吧。

contents.en: Which plate do you want it on?
I want it on the yellow plate.
Okay. Here it goes.
There you go.
Mommy will cut it for you.
Darling. it's time for dinner.
Oh, my baby already finished it.
contents.ch: 喔，我的宝贝已经吃完了。

contents.en: Oh, done already, huh?
We should do the dishes.
Mommy will make more delicious food for you.
contents.ch: 妈咪给你做更好吃的食物。

contents.en: Here are the spoon and the fork.
I'll wash the orange.
Wait a minute. The food's almost done.
Would you like a cup of tea? / Would you care for  some tea?
What kind of tea do you to drink? Is green tea  fine?
contents.ch: 你想喝什么茶？绿茶可以吗？

contents.en: Let's play doctor. / Let's play hospital.
Mom, I want to be the doctor.
Okay, I'll be the patient.
I'm a nurse to help the doctor.
How can I help you? / What's troubling you?
My head/ stomach hurts.
My ears/ eyes/ legs hurt.
I have a fever and a stomachache.
Where exactly do you feel pain?
contents.ch: 确切地说，是哪一个部位痛呢？

contents.en: It itches because of my rash.
I feel itchy.
Open your mouth wide. Say " Ah..."
I'm going to take your temperature.
You have a high fever.
Nurse, can you give me my stethoscope?
contents.ch: 护士，你能把听诊器给我吗？

contents.en: Take a deep breath in and out.
We need to do surgery.
I'll write you a prescription.
I'm going to give you a shot.
Can you give me a shot that won't hurt?
contents.ch: 你能让我打针时不感觉痛吗？

contents.en: It will sting a little bit.
Good job.
The next patient, Teddy bear! Come in.
contents.ch: 下一个患者，玩具熊！请进。

contents.en: Doctor, my baby's really sick.
contents.ch: 医生，我的孩子很不舒服。

contents.en: Lie on the bed, please.
I'll put on some ointment.
You need to stay in the hospital.
Nurse, can you take this patient to the treatment  room?
contents.ch: 护士，你能带这位患者到诊疗室吗？

contents.en: It hurts a lot, doesn't it?
Don't worry. You will be fine soon.
contents.ch: 不用担心，你很快就会好起来。

contents.en: Go to the pharmacy now.
Was I a good doctor?
Did I do a good job?
Look at this dinosaur I drew.
Wow, it looks so real!
Mom, can you draw a car for me?
You can draw it by yourself.
Try drawing the wheels by yourself.
I'll draw the car. Will you color it?
I'm not that good.
I'm not good at drawing.
Look, Mom! Here's my circle.
Look what I drew. / Look at my picture.
I drew this.
Isn't this cool?
Mom, I want to draw.
What do you want to draw?
I want to draw the sea.
About the sea, what can you think of?
What can we see in the sea?
contents.ch: 在海里，我们能看到什么？

contents.en: I can think of fish, mermaids, waves, ships, and clams.
contents.ch: 我想到鱼、人鱼公主、海浪、船、贝壳。

contents.en: What do you want to draw first?
Draw whatever you want.
What do you want to draw with?
With crayons / paints / pastels / color pencils.
contents.ch: 用蜡笔/颜料/粉蜡笔/色铅笔画。

contents.en: Let's open the sketchbook.
Get out the drawing paper.
Let's draw a sketch.
What did you draw here?
You forgot to draw the ears.
Now color the picture.
Mom, how do you draw dinosaurs?
